configs.name: Checking for homebrew environment in ~/.bashrc
actions:
printf "

# Load the homebrew basic environment
if [[ -f "/opt/homebrew/bin/brew" ]]; then
  eval "$(/opt/homebrew/bin/brew shellenv)"
else
  eval "$(/usr/local/bin/brew shellenv)"
fi" >> ~/.bashrc

configs.name: Checking for tmux autoloading in ~/.bash_profile
configs.prompt: Would you like to have tmux automatically start when you open a terminal?
actions:
printf "

# Autostart tmux if it's installed, and if we're not already in a tmux session
if command -v tmux &> /dev/null && [ -n "\$PS1" ] && [[ ! "\$TERM" =~ screen ]] && [[ ! "\$TERM" =~ tmux ]] && [ -z "\$TMUX" ]; then
  tmux a -t default || exec tmux new -s default && exit;
fi
" >> ~/.bash_profile
